name: CreateSharingPassword
description:
Create a new password for sharing configuration.

Use this tool to create a new password for the sharing configuration of a specific insight within a project environment on Datadog.

parameters.name: insight_identifier
parameters.description: The unique integer ID of the insight for which you want to create a sharing password.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: The ID of the project you want to access. Obtain this by calling /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

parameters.name: sharing_configuration_details
parameters.description: JSON object containing the sharing configuration details such as 'created_at' (string), 'enabled' (boolean), 'access_token' (string), 'settings' (JSON), 'password_required' (boolean), and 'share_passwords' (string).

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the PostHog API.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.
